local_intent: approach white_plate: verify visibility, move above, align precisely, compute grasp pose, confirm pose available
assumptions: white_plate is within sensor view or was previously detected
robot is free to move to the above position without collision
gripper open state is as expected from upstream global BT
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'approach' phase: moves above the white plate, performs precise approach/alignment, computes the side grasp (same result_key), and verifies the computed pose before subsequent pick.
